topic.title: Game.of.Thrones.S01E01.HDTV.Rifftrax
topic.body:
Rifftrax audio perfectly synced and ducked with the audio and video of the first episode of game of thrones. The original audio file can be found at http://www.rifftrax.com/game-of-thrones-season-1-episode-1

If you enjoy please consider donating to the rifftrax team http://www.rifftrax.com/donate
